Text: Isnt it time you put your phone bill on holdPST From Jenna Myers Scouting Report Subject Problems We have the solutions Sponsored by TechnoScout where technology hits home Our Research and Development team is constantly working to find the newest innovations that make your life more fun or simply better Think you have heard it all before Think again Because we have all the same problems as you such as skyhigh phone bills the solutions we seek are based on practicality with modern hightech twists Let TechnoScout be your number one problem solver in and read on for the opportunity to make your life simpler Cancel your phone bill The CellSocket gives you the convenience of making and receiving calls on your cell phone service while using a regular cordless phone Take advantage of low long distance charges you get with your cell phone from your home phone Now you can get the convenience of making and receiving calls on your cell phone service using a regular cordless phone CellSocket works with Nokia and brand cell phone and makes your cell phone service accessible through an ordinary cordless or desktop phone Its so simple to set up too On a twoline phone system make your second wired line your cellular phone line Integrate your cellular service with your wireline telephone service by using a twoline cordless phone Plug one line of a cordless phone into CellSocket and the other line into any telephone wall jack Drop your cell phone into the CellSocket and start making and receiving phone calls using your wireless phone service Imagine the savings youll be able to take advantage of Use leftover monthly minutes free nights or weekends and other cellular calling plan features all with your home phone It al so enhances your reception because of the builtin antenna booster in the base Find out how to take advantage of the low phone bills your cell phone offers at home cgibinfloyeONZDlbdPEveiXA Weekly Top Picks for TechnoScout HappyEyes Floor Lamp A floor lamp that spreads sunshine all over a room The Verilux HappyEyes Floor Lamp brings the benefits of natural daylight indoors for glarefree lighting thats perfect for a variety of indoor activities cgibinfloyeONZDlbdPEveiYA Telemergency Are you anxious that you or a loved one is alone during an emergency If youve fallen or had an accident Telemergency sends for help with just one press of a Innovative stereo breaks the sound and size barrierPST Jenna Myers Scouting Report January Sponsored by TechnoScout Where technology hits home Imagine this You lean back in your seat as the symphony begins The overture begins by the string section with a soothing melody In comes the brass with high piercing treble followed by percussion with teethrattling bass Your eyes closed you sink into your chair and let the rich sound fill your head Suddenly the phone on your desk rings You realize you are not at Carnegie Hall youre at your office and thats not a symphony orchestra its the new Aiwa Digital Audio System cgibinfloyeNyDlbdPGZteGWAC Can you experience surround sound using just two speakers QSurround proves its possible Using unique signal processing algorithms based on advanced psychoacoustics Qsurround circuitry creates a phantom center channel expands the front left and right soundfield and places virtual surround speakers around you to simulate the effect of a multichannel system Aiwa portable stereos with QSurround are capable of delivering a rich allencompassing soundfield that recreates the you are there experience as no conventional compact twospeaker system can Superior design surprising sound The Aiwa Digital Audio System cgibinfloyeNyDlbdPGZteGWAC synthesizes the latest acoustic technology with practical features and attractive design The wood cabinet blends with nearly any dcor and its robust construction results in enhanced sound reproduction Independent tuned bass reflex speaker enclosures provide tighter bass response and the inch baffle board helps eliminate any resonance within the speaker enclosure It features Watts per Channel total and the Super TBass delivers deep and powerful bass sound without the boominess that characterizes systems with less sophisticated lowfrequency enhancement circuits Thats because Super TBass was specifically engineered to improve the lowend performance of small speakers taking into account their particular resonance characteristics Cuttingedge commitment Since being founded in Aiwa has been a leader in the field of consumer electronics and acoustic technology This explains the companys record of firsts including making Japans first cassette tape recorder Japans first stereo cassette deck the first company to manufacture digital audio tape DAT products the first to market a recording headphone stereo and a leader in minisystems This same commitment to cutting edge technology has enabled Aiwa to create the gold standard in portable CD stereos Great sound is only the beginning The Aiwa Digital Audio System cgibinfloyeNyDlbdPGZteGWAC also incorporates the latest features for functionality and convenience The Full Logic Mechanism with AutoReverse provides for smoother less clumsy operation Unlike many comparable units made by other manufacturers this one is compatible with CDs made with a recorder or computer like CDRRW The CD player has Repeat Random and Programmed play and the AMFM Stereo has station preset memory and Digitally Synthesized tuning for locking in stations There is even a preset equalizer with selectable modes for Pop Rock and Jazz Try it factorydirect riskfree Thanks to our special relationship with the manufacturer we can offer it with a special payment plan and our exclusive riskfree trial Order today and if you are not completely satisfied for any reason simply return it within days for a full refund of the purchase price Call tollfree hours a day and mention promotional code If you wish to subscribe to the free TechnoScout Scouting Report send your email request to the below address mailto If you wish to unsubscribe to TechnoScouts Scouting Report send your email request to the below address mailto

Record your own CDs at homePST From Jenna Myers Scouting Report Subject You are the first to know Sponsored by TechnoScout where technology hits home Here at TechnoScout we work hard to bring you products now that you will not see in stores for months It is our promise to you to keep you uptodate of the neatest coolest latest hightech gear every month Take a look at some of the products below that made our list of some of the best products to cross our rigorous testing and analyzing this month Photos music important documents Now that everything is on your computer copy it The EPO CD Backup Duplicator makes flawless copies of any format CD including audio data or video To make backup copies of CDs you typically need a CD reader CDROM for the source disk you are copying a CD burner CDR or CDRW to write the copy CD and a computer with appropriate software to format the files The EPO CD Backup Duplicator does it alleasily and automaticallywithout the need of a computer Most duplicating procedures may not be able to copy certain protected files But CD Backup uses a technology called image copy to duplicate the exact same data found on the original disk The EPO CD Backup can flawlessly duplicate any format of compact disk even protected ones see warning below The CD Backup is the right choice for excellent accuracy You can use CD Backup to copy important data and application files for safe storage And you can use the duplicator to create your own personal audio disks from tracks taken from your own personal CD collection To find out more about this musthave product click here cgibinfloyeOKbDlbdPGcmeTwAu Disclaimer EPO CD Backup should be used only for backing up personal data and compiling personal audio tracks Any copyright of material in a source disk belongs to the author andor company which issued the disk Unauthorized duplication of copyrighted material is strictly prohibited Weekly Top Picks Nostalgia Music System Peggy Sue never sounded so good The Nostalgia Music System starts your day off right with your favorite CD music all in a retro cabinet design that will take you back to the good old days Wake up to the past here cgibinfloyeOKbDlbdPGcmeTxAv Oxygenics Shower Head Energize your shower and cut your energy costs in half The Oxygenics showerhead uses less water and delivers twice the spraying power This is the way every shower should feel cgibinfloyeOKbDlbdPGcmeTyAw Atomic Digital Watch Time zone to time zonenever set your watch again Atomic digital watch keeps absolute time and date accuracy by tuning in to Breakthrough receiver puts Internet radio on home stereosimagesscoutTechnoHeaderSmallgif Scouting Report Special EditionWhere technology hits home Every year the worlds most innovative electronics companies meet in Las Ve gas to unveil their newest creations The Consumer Electronics Show feature s thousands of new products and is attended by every major retailer in the world Unfortunately most of these retailers are limited by a lack of shel f space and convoluted distribution systems By the time the newest technol ogy makes it to their stores it is not so new That is not the case at Tec hnoScoutcom where you can find the latest greatest neatest and coolest products often before they are available in stores Here is one of our fav orite products from this years show Your radio just got new stations The iRhythm Wireless Remote Tuner makes it easy to listen to the best progr ams in the world in high fidelity without hardwired connections If you believe you have been missing something great from your PC and Inter net connection you may be right It is radio from stations throughout Nort h America and around the world in high fidelity If you know about Net radi o you realize that hundreds of radio stations from everywhere in the world are broadcast over the Internet The trouble is you have to surf the Web to find them that can take hours Then you have to listen to them in fron t of your PC over small speakers The iRhythm Wireless Internet Remote Tune r from Sonicbox solves both of these problems effortlessly The system give s you the software and components to turn your stereo into a high fidelity receiver of Best of Planet TM Internet radio stations Even more you do no t need a highspeed Internet connection and there is no wiring necessary b etween your PC and stereo Once you set up the iRhythm Remote Tuner you can dial up any station on the Internet without touching your computer as long as it is turn ed on A handheld RF remote control lets you switch station s from anywhere in your house up to feet away from your computer throu gh walls and floors using the same kind of MHz frequency used on cord less telephones Listen to the music with iRhythm
